mapper.select: SELECT SOCIAL_ID AS socialId, USER_ID AS userId, PROVIDER AS provider, PROVIDER_ID AS providerId, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM SOCIAL_ACCOUNT WHERE PROVIDER = #{provider} AND PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOCIAL_ACCOUNT ( SOCIAL_ID, USER_ID, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{userId}, #{provider}, #{providerId} )
